Text:
Thanks for this!

@ DR_homiside

You're a retard, that needs to get a life! A sad, sad, excuse for a human being. The Worlds in its present condition, because of hate filled people like you. Grow up!
MatteyBomb is so jealous of the lead actor it would seem. What happened Matteybomb? Does your girlfriend prefer him rather than you, or should I say your ex girlfriend? hahaha!

@ fall1en

Actually, if he had a girlfriend they probably split because MatteyBomb/DR_homiside is struggling with his sexuality. Vehemently trying to deny his preference for the same sex, so he does what every ignorant hypocrite with no integrity would do, bashes gays as loudly as he can, everywhere he can, like a child, trying to compensate for his deep insecurities. He is either an adolescent brat, or a fundamentalist christian, or both.
Actually hes stating a fact. So if he parades around as gay i dont see why guys should'nt be insecure. i as one wudnt wanna be in their shoes, cuz gays are f**kin blowjobs.

@MatteyBomb  unlike you, I don't need more than one identity. I'm comfortable with who I am. You clearly are not. Don't worry we completely get it. I'm not the only person that wishes you'd jump off a high building.

dude, just get a cock extension, & you'll be half the man he is.

MatteyBomb

You really are a lonely soul, if you honestly think I'm planning on returning next week to listen to any further dribble spew out your mouth. You're a child, that has no one to play with, so you come here & share what little there is in that feeble mind of yours.


I feel sorry for you, because you clearly have some deep seated self-hatred going on. You're looking for attention, is all this is about. No-body notices you when you're out in the world right, so you come in here to stir things up? It's Ok matteyBomb, you do whatever you need to do, to feel your life has any point.

I suggest to people to use the magnet link from now on. If nobody's watching he'll have no one to play his sad little game with.

MatteyBomb/DR_homiside

I'm sorry for making fun of you. I'm not helping you heal, by treating you with contempt. I don't understand why you hate people that are gay, but you have the right to hate if you choose . I've had the pleasure of meeting a number of gay men & woman in my lifetime, & they aren't monsters. Love is love, regardless of where you find it.

Cheers!
